author: arun
msg: Added support for multiple resource base.

author: duncan
msg: Updated to properly exit javac tasks when there is an error during compilation.

author: duncan
msg: Tweaked java version detection logic to execute up front and report the
version of Java in use by the runtime.

author: duncan
msg: The way properties can be defined has been updated. To override a default
project property, use the `-Dpropname=value` syntax. This follows the same
pattern as setting system properties when executing the java interpreter.
Also, starting to beef up documentation of internal code. Needs a lot more
work, but this is a start.
